name: Spotclick
description:
I don't think anyone knows this, but this game has controller support! On an Xbox controller, B to shoot, left control stick to move, right control stick to aim. Have fun!

There is a cheat code for more health, but I'll let you figure it out on your own :)

To toggle FPS counter, press B to show it and N to hide it.

Controls:

W --Move Up

S -- Move Down

A -- Move Left

D -- Move Right

Space -- Shoot OR Click

K -- End Game

Your shots follow the mouse pointer.

To change the type of graphics:

-M for old sprites

-L for really old sprites

-N for new shots with trail(Would not recommend, looks really ugly)
